remarks: Perform the substitutions into the strict weak ordering law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2014.)
statement:
swopolem.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. A /\ z e. A ) ) -> ( x R y -> ( x R z \/ z R y ) ) ) $.
swopolem $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. A /\ Y e. A /\ Z e. A ) ) -> ( X R Y -> ( X R Z \/ Z R Y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d Y y z $.
$d Z z $.
$d ph x y z $.
